ygData.subject: RE: tiny daggers in Qeynos?
ygData.msgSnippet: in freeport, go see the vendor in the courtyard, in the far corner at the academy of arcance sciences. she has them. Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild,
ygData.messageBody:
in freeport, go see the vendor in the courtyard, in the far corner at the
academy of arcance sciences. she has them.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
Qoronita, 5th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
(let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)


At 01:43 PM 7/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Ken Allred" <thatch@...>
>
>Is there any place in Freeport to buy tiny daggers? I have looked and
>looked there for them and have not found them. If they aren't in Freeport,
>where else (besides Erudin) can we get the daggers?
>
